item.title: How do i change max lvl
item.dc:creator: @tyguy tyguy
item.description:
@tyguy wrote:

Greez he is just asking how to do something…
Ill help you though

OK to change your peoples stats without training…

  1. open up file HybridScape
  2. open up file characters
  3. find your file like your name say you named your self admin open note pad file called admin
  4. scroll down till you see stuff like [SKILLS]
    under that is each skill of your player
  5. Not really sure witch one is with but say you wanted to change all your stats to 80 you do this
  6. where it says

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 99 14001340
character-skill = 1 99 14000000
character-skill = 2 99 14000000
character-skill = 3 99 14000419
character-skill = 4 99 14000000
character-skill = 5 99 14000024
character-skill = 6 99 14000000
character-skill = 7 99 14000000
character-skill = 8 99 14000000
character-skill = 9 99 14000000
character-skill = 10 99 14000000
character-skill = 11 99 14000000
character-skill = 12 99 14000000
character-skill = 13 99 14000000
character-skill = 14 99 14000000
character-skill = 15 99 14000000
character-skill = 16 99 14000000
character-skill = 17 99 14000000
character-skill = 18 99 14000000
character-skill = 19 99 14000000
character-skill = 20 99 14000000
character-skill = 21 99 14000000
character-skill = 22 99 14000000
character-skill = 23 99 14000000
character-skill = 24 99 14000000
^ ^
change all the 99 -----------^ ^
^
to 80 and at the--------------------------^ that is your XP so u need to change that

  1. the xp level for lvl 80 is 1,986,068 so take out the the commas(,) and add that there

  2. so there you go and ill include a download for a xp table so u have it to make any lvl u want

Hope this helps!

Read full topic
